item.description:

item.title: Just-In: Coinbase Apologizes For Calling PEPE A “Hate Symbol” | Coingape
item.dc:creator: Coingape Staff
item.description:
Crypto News: Paul Grewal, the chief legal officer of Coinbase (COIN), has issued an apology late Thursday noon for a company newsletter that was sent out to its users outlining the Frog meme — which acts as the foundation for the PEPE cryptocurrency — as a hate symbol that is used by the “alt-rights group”.

The post Just-In: Coinbase Apologizes For Calling PEPE A “Hate Symbol” appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Bankruptcy Judge Approves $300M Payment to BlockFi Customers-Report | Coingape
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
Based on a May 11th ruling, BlockFi custody wallet users may receive up to $300 million as a refund. This ruling, according to a Coindesk report, comes after a bankruptcy judge clarified that assets in custodial wallets belong to customers and not the embattled cryptocurrency exchange. Specifically, under bankruptcy law funds which belong to customers
